items.sentence: That was one of the funniest jokes I'd ever heard.
Tom and Mary don't know anything about each other.
I can't believe that I finally managed to do that.
Tom didn't realize Mary wasn't having a good time.
When was the last time that you ate a pomegranate?
I suspect that Tom knows what he's supposed to do.
My grandfather has retired because he's grown old.
Since I'd never met Tom before, I didn't know him.
Tom didn't have a girlfriend when I first met him.
I think that you're the only one who believes Tom.
I can't believe that you did all this by yourself.
Tom had trouble believing Mary actually liked him.
Tom isn't sure Mary knows that she has to do that.
Were you able to do everything that you had to do?
I've heard Tom will be moving to Boston next year.
I'm sure that I won't be the first one to do that.
It's hard to cook for Tom because he's very picky.
Maybe we should ask Tom to do that somewhere else.
Which season do you like better, spring or summer?
I only did that because Tom told me that I had to.
I don't know exactly what I'm supposed to do next.
I think that I may have to go to Boston next week.
That isn't the main reason why Tom had to do that.
Tom is the guy over there sitting near the window.
I didn't know anything about that until yesterday.
No matter what happens, catch that train tomorrow.
I was relieved to know that I wasn't the only one.
Why do you get embarrassed when people praise you?
Just be careful not to let the cat out of the bag.
Name a Christmas song you never hear on the radio.
How was I supposed to know that Tom would be late?
We are never as happy or as unhappy as we imagine.
Despite the concerns, the weather was magnificent.
Tom is the only one here who's stronger than I am.
Tom got arrested by a plainclothes police officer.
This is the kind of job you should do all at once.
This is the last time I'll ask you to do anything.
Tom grew up in a small town not too far from here.
Tom didn't mention any reason for why he was late.
Parents will be invited to the school celebration.
Tom is always trying to impose his will on others.
Tom walked around campus looking for his notebook.
Because it was very cold yesterday, I stayed home.
It seems like the cat caught the scent of a mouse.
I think you should go and try your luck elsewhere.
Tom would get that job if he was fluent in French.
I hate when other people make me wait a long time.
I didn't know how to do what I was supposed to do.
This is still one of the best restaurants in town.
That was one of the classiest things Tom ever did.
